channel.title: Logging in to Mopar Problem
channel.description:
Hey, I downloaded all the client stuff for MoparScape 3.2 w/Aryan and it loads fine. But when I try to log in, I click Start Server. It says server created blah blah tells me to go login. So I click "enter" and type in a random name and pass, with a server IP of 127.0.0.1 (the default one). Then it says "error connecting to server, must be down. Go create one and log in". So I repeated the cycle several times with the same results.
Then I noticed down in the black box it said "Server: Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?"
I don't know what a port is all I know is that it has to be open to play RuneScape (the original game). So can someone please tell me how to open this port or do whatever I need to do to log in? Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 03:30:36 PM[/size][hr]Nobody knows how to open a port here? Sounds relatively simple...come on!

item.title: Logging in to Mopar Problem

item.description:
@Yo_ho_ho wrote:

How can I tell?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 03:49:36 PM[/size][hr]EDIT: Windows was blocking something I unblocked and it worked nevermind.
